summary:
---ADDED IMAGES---

Like many, I found that the Nightingale armor enchantments didn\'t really fit my character and play style. I have revamped the set (all levels) so that the enchantments make more sense for a straight thief.
descriptionHtml:
This mod only changes some of the enchantment and enchantment effect levels on the Nightingale armor (all levels). It should not conflict with any other mod unless that mod does the same thing. This is my first mod, however, so I\'m still learning the ropes with regard to stuff like that. 

This mod was made to suit my personal play style and desires for the armor. I am making it available to save people the trouble of doing the work themselves if they end up liking my changes.

Please endorse if you like the mod. =-) 

[size=4][b]Detailed Changes:[/b][/size]

[b]Boots[/b]

Character Level 1-18: Changed Muffle effect magnitude from .25 to 5
Character Level 19-31: Changed Muffle effect magnitude from .5 to 15
Character Level 32+: Unchanged (Muffle effect magnitude is 35)

[b]Armor[/b] 
(All armor levels retain default Stamina boost.)

Character Level 1-18: Changed Resist Frost to Increase Carry Weight 25
Character Level 19-31: Changed Resist Frost to Increase Carry Weight 35
Character Level 32+: Changed Resist Frost to Increase Carry Weight 50

[b]Hood[/b]

Character Level 1-18: Changed Fortify Illusion to Fortify Archery 10 & Fortify Barter 10
Character Level 19-31: Changed Fortify Illusion to Fortify Archery 15 & Fortify Barter 15
Character Level 32+: Changed \"Fortify Illusion\" to Fortify Archery 20 & Fortify Barter 20

[b]Gloves[/b]

Unchanged
author: Grungydan
